title: Genshin Card
description: 米哈游游戏数据统计卡片生成器。
description:pt-BR: ‌Jogo MiHoYo Cartão de Geração de Estatísticas.

params.name: gameName
params.moreDescription: 可选值：`hi3`（崩坏3）`ys`（原神）`sr`（崩坏：星穹铁道）`zzz`（绝区零）。
params.moreDescription:en-US: Supported: `hi3` (Honkai Impact 3), `ys` (Genshin Impact), `sr` (Honkai: Star Rail), `zzz` (Zenless Zone Zero).
params.moreDescription:pt-BR: Suportado: `hi3` (Honkai Impact 3), `ys` (Genshin Impact), `sr` (Honkai: Star Rail), `zzz` (Zenless Zone Zero).

params.name: bgImageId
params.moreDescription: 格式：`rand`（随机）`1,2-4`（`,`分割，`-`指定范围，结果为 `1,2,3,4`），更多图片参考：[hoyo-card-assets](https://github.com/qhy040404/hoyo-card-assets)。
params.moreDescription:en-US: Format: `rand` (Random), `1,2-4` (`,` split, `-` range, result is `1,2,3,4`). More images reference: [hoyo-card-assets](https://github.com/qhy040404/hoyo-card-assets).
params.moreDescription:pt-BR: Formato: `rand` (Aleatório), `1,2-4` (`,` divisão, `-` faixa, resultado é `1,2,3,4`). Mais imagens de referência: [hoyo-card-assets](https://github.com/qhy040404/hoyo-card-assets).

params.name: miyousheUID
params.moreDescription: 请确保开启了米游社个人信息公开。
params.moreDescription:en-US: Please make sure that you have enabled the public display of personal information on Miyoushe.
params.moreDescription:pt-BR: Certifique-se de ter habilitado a exibição pública de informações pessoais no Miyoushe.
